name: Thomas Keller
awards: Masala TV Award for Best Cooking Expert
Lux Style Award for Best TV Chef

recipes.name: Biryani
recipes.description: A classic Pakistani dish made with flavored rice and meat, often served with raita.
recipes.cookingMethod: Cook the rice separately and then layer it with the cooked meat and spices. The dish is then cooked on low heat until the flavors meld together.

recipes.name: Nihari
recipes.description: A slow-cooked stew made with beef or lamb shanks and a flavorful spice blend.
recipes.cookingMethod: The meat is first simmered in water with the spices, then the stew is thickened with a flour-based paste. It is typically served with naan or roti.

recipes.name: Samosas
recipes.description: A popular snack made with crispy pastry and a savory filling.
recipes.cookingMethod: The pastry is rolled out and cut into triangles, then filled with a mixture of mashed potatoes, peas, and spices. The samosas are then deep-fried until golden brown.

description: Thomas Keller is an American chef and restaurateur. He is the owner and head chef of The French Laundry, a three-Michelin-starred restaurant in Yountville, California, as well as several other restaurants across the US..
